Summary Note:
The RM met Dekkers Willems at a yacht party in Amsterdam. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Having worked for over 23 years, Dekkers Willems brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Dekkers Willems is currently widowed. His children are named Van den Berg, Daantje and Bo.
Education Background:
Dekkers completed his secondary education at CSG Willem van Oranje Apeldoorn in 1997.
Dekkers finished his studies at Nyenrode Business Universiteit in 2003.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 23 years, Dekkers Willems has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Dekkers Willems began his professional journey as a Stockbroker at APG Asset Management N.V. in 2002, laying the foundation for future success.
At Robeco Institutional Asset Management B.V., he held the position of Portfolio Manager from 2005 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 360000 EUR.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 2300000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1130000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned Tech Entrepreneur, in 2006.
Client Summary: In summary, Dekkers has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
